name: Gargoyles: The Complete First Season (Special 10th Anniversary Edition) (Full Frame)

reviews.name: Gargoyles: The Complete First Season (Special 10th Anniversary Edition) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText:
Yeah, I know, pretentious overweening title for a review of an animated series, but bear with me. This show has more tragedy, better characters, and clever dialogue than 90% of what you'd television today or yesterday. The show has powerful themes of love, loss, and treachery across its entire run. Along with great animation and great villains it is shameful the show wasn't finished (3rd season doesn't count) and the moral guardians had to butt in to ruin what drama might have been greater with their ridiculous bans on things like guns and punching (why, exactly, they never came down so hard on, say, Batman TAS or Power Rangers-which was imitable violence I will never know).

This series is also a great way of introducing the younger set to Shakespeare.
reviews.title: Shakespeare for the Modern Day

reviews.name: Gargoyles: The Complete First Season (Special 10th Anniversary Edition) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: I've loved this series since I was a kid and I tickled to find it on DVD. It was an added bones that it was on sale at about $20.
reviews.title: Great Series!

reviews.title: 08 August 2007

reviews.name: Gargoyles: The Complete First Season (Special 10th Anniversary Edition) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Son enjoyed this produt and it was just what he wanted. Good value.
reviews.title: good product that met expectations

reviews.name: Gargoyles: The Complete First Season (Special 10th Anniversary Edition) (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: The show was a personal favorite of mine growing up, and thought huh that would be nice to have for memory lane. It came in quicker than I thought, and was able to relive my childhood again! Even my husband enjoyed it. The discs were of good quality, no scratches. Played wonderful on my PS3. If you are a fan of the show, you won't be disappointed!
reviews.title: Just as I remembered it! Awesome Purchase!
